name: Throttle Powah VR
description: Welcome to a fresh multiplayer, VR, racing, freestyle and Soccer experience. Each VR tracked controller is a mono-wheel motorized rocket. You have freedom to race and perform freestyle jumps and maneuvers in VR using the physics principle of sports like snowboard, skate and motocross.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
